document_data.name: House of Cleanliness
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Cleanliness''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Launderers' Guild]].<ref>
document_data.Location: The House of Cleanliness was located along the [[Slipstone Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls, the House of Cleanliness was considered by locals to be a landmark.
